comments.raw_text: Can you elaborate? What I think you're trying to say doesn't happen for me so I'd like to better understand the problem.
comments.creator: paul@oshannessy.com
comments.text: Can you elaborate? What I think you're trying to say doesn't happen for me so I'd like to better understand the problem.

comments.author: dugar.siddhartha@gmail.com
comments.creator: dugar.siddhartha@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
If you want the STR use these:
1. Open an App Tab
2. Open a couple of normal tabs
3. Close Firefox with a normal tab active
4. Start Firefox and do Restore Previous Session

Expected: The last selected tab should be active
Actual: The last App Tab is active.
comments.text:

comments.raw_text: dugar.siddhartha@gmail.com, asking the release team to track a bug is not the way you express your interest in seeing it fixed. Please stop doing that. Thanks.
comments.creator: asa@mozilla.com
